entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
